name: Boundary NGINX Free plugin
description: Boundary Nginx Plugin - Displays NGINX Free metrics

paramSchema.title: Poll Interval
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: The Poll Interval in milliseconds. Ex. 1000

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The Source to display in the legend for the nginx data.  It will default to the hostname of the server

paramSchema.title: Statistics URL
paramSchema.name: url
paramSchema.description: The URL endpoint of where the nginx statistics are hosted.

paramSchema.title: Username
paramSchema.name: username
paramSchema.description: If the endpoint is password protected, what username we should use when calling it.

paramSchema.title: Password
paramSchema.name: password
paramSchema.description: If the endpoint is password protected, what password we should use when calling it.
